1.content:
Becky: a young 18 year old white girl. She has blonde hair and size 9 feet. She wears glasses and loves to be blind folded when tortured. Hates to be tickled and wants to leave. She is skinny and is only wearing a bra and panties.

Emma: a 25 year old British girls. She has brown hair and is tanned. She has size 7 feet. She likes to see what torture awaits her so she can prepare. Wants to leave and kinda likes to be tickled after all the years of torture. She is skinny and is wearing a grey belly shirt and has on booty shorts. She has on high heels that are black.

Tiffany: a 20 year old black girl. She has black hair and has size 8 feet. She hates to be tickled and is a strong fighter. Wants to leave. She has size 6 feet and is wearing a see through dress and stockings. She is wearing high heels.

Rebecca: a 19 year old emo girl. She has pink hair and is very pale. She has size 10 feet and likes to be tickled. She doesn't want to leave. She is wearing a tank top and booty shorts. She is wearing ripped stockings and Uggs. Only one jack wants to trade because she likes torture.

Jessie: a 21 year old white girl. She has red hair. She has size 71/2 feet. She hates the tickling the most. She is wearing ripped bra and panties. She wants to leave the most and gets the most torture.

All girls are tickled in these clothes all the time and are tied spread eagle

152.content: As jack walked into the lab seeing his victim helpless tied he wanted to go for the most exposed space first. Jessie was blindfolded so she can't see anything. As jack slowly creeped onto the lab table so she wouldn't notice. He then grabbed a baby oil bottle and poured it onto her belly. "Hey who's there please don't torture me." She said. "To late for that Hun can't waste good baby oil." He then slowly slide his fingers down her sides making her instantly laugh. Hahahahahahahahahahah. "You are extra ticklish today Jessie." Jack said. He then moved to her belly button and stuck one finger in. This made her go mad. " hahahahahahahahahahahahah pl-pl-pl-ease stooooooop." He then decided to use a tool. " hhhhmmmm which tool should I use he thought.
152.title: Belly
